attribs.current: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-KdrHoyySeh0806GPraS_attack_string
attribs.current: +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I'm a snob and always look down on people and i am an avid shoe wearer with a cod piece fetish

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: im only in it for the money

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: his shoes and his cod piece

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I'm never satisfied and i always want more

attribs.name: appearance
attribs.current: well dressed in fine black leather armor tailored to look like a three piece suite

attribs.name: backstory
attribs.current: grim is an asshole and tends to find his way into deals where coin flows freely. grim is an avid shoe wearer and feeds his habit on the backs of those less fortunate and is just as likely to step on those backs as he is to step over them. currently his life has taken him into the company of four other heroes. he hopes they dont get in the way of his cod piece

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current: trinket: a sheet of parchment upon which is drawn a complex mechanical contraption.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kf1WAVrWi0RfgRZhGAx_content
attribs.current: You can use your sorcery points to gain additional spell slots, or sacrifice spell slots to gain additional sorcery points.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kf1WAVs2tIuL6vivSZS_content
attribs.current:
Creating Spell Slots. You can transform unexpended sorcery points into one spell slot as a bonus action on your turn. You can create spell slots no higher in level than 5th.Any spell slot you create with this feature vanishes when you finish a long rest.
Spell Slot  Sorcery Point Cost
   1st     2
   2nd     3
   3rd     5
   4th     6
   5th     7
Converting a Spell Slot to Sorcery Points. As a bonus action on your turn, you can expend one spell slot and gain a number of sorcery points equal to the slot's level.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-Kf1WAVs2tIuL6vivSZT_content
attribs.current:
You gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options of your choice. You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.
You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.
Careful Spell, Distant Spell, Empowered Spell, Extended Spell, Heightened Spell, Quickened Spell, Subtle Spell, Twinned Spell.
